Welcome to Wednesday's live moderation of “What’s Going On in This Graph?”  Today’s graphs display the sources of electricity globally and by country for China, the U.S. and India. 

From 9 am – 2 pm E.T. today, share with us your responses online for the four questions listed in the release.  If your notice includes a claim, please back it up with evidence that supports your claim.  By Friday morning, we’ll reveal the free link to the online article that included these graphs, shout outs for some of the catchiest headlines and more.  

You can get a link to your response to share with your teacher and classmates by clicking the response box below your response “Email me when my comment is published.”  

The next graph will be released by Friday, April 12, with live-moderation in two weeks later on Wednesday, April 17.  The topic – shrinkflation!
